name: Fruit Quest
description:
Play the exciting match 3 puzzle game from the makers of Bubble Birds!

Feed Draco the Dragon by swapping colorful, juicy FRUIT to match 3 or more! Explore the many challenging levels and game modes in the beautiful world of Fruit Quest -- you’ll be addicted from the first bite!

- MATCH FRUIT in 190 puzzles -- each one is unique and full of fun and fascinating challenges!
- EXPLORE beautiful islands together with Draco the Dragon!
- CREATE FRUITASTIC COMBOS by matching special Power Fruit!
- EASY TO LEARN -- challenging to master: can you reach 3 stars on every level and beat your friends’ scores?
- UNLOCK exciting BOOSTS, hidden power-ups and amass HUGE score multipliers!
- GORGEOUS animations and effects!
- MASTER tricky obstacles like glass tiles, chocolate foam, nets and much more!
- FREE updates with new fruit, levels, boosts, obstacles, challenges, prizes and more!
- DAILY SPIN! Play the Daily Spin for free each day for your chance to win BIG coin and gem prizes (as well as SPECIAL collectible items)!

Fruit Quest is the BEST-looking FREE match-3 puzzle game for your phone or tablet! Thank you for playing!

Visit our Facebook Fruit Quest community: https://www.facebook.com/FruitQuest

Please e-mail us at fqsupport@ximad.com with any issues, questions or comments! We would love to hear from you!
